00051 static unsigned _getHeartbeat( struct Acq200Device* device )
00052 {
00053         return BP_GET_HEARTBEAT(MBOX_READ(device, BP_MB_STATUS));
00054 }
00055 
00056 int acq200_getHeartbeat( struct Acq200Device* device )
00057 // return heartbeat
00058 {
00059         DECLARE_WAIT_QUEUE_HEAD(waitq);
00060         unsigned v1, v2;
00061     
00062         v1 = _getHeartbeat( device );
00063 
00064         init_waitqueue_head( &waitq );    
00065         dbg(2,  " 1 waitq %p, timeout %d\n", &waitq, HZ/10  );
00066         interruptible_sleep_on_timeout( &waitq, HZ/10 );
00067         dbg(2,  " 2\n" );
00068         v2 = _getHeartbeat( device );
00069  
00070         if ( v2 != v1 ){
00071                 if ( v2 > v1 ){
00072                         dbg(2, "acq32_heartbeat %d ticks/sec\n", 
00073                                     (v2-v1)*10 );
00074                         return device->heartbeat_detected = v2 - v1;
00075                 }else{
00076                         dbg(2,  " 3\n" );
00077                         init_waitqueue_head( &waitq );    
00078                         interruptible_sleep_on_timeout( &waitq, HZ/10 );
00079                         dbg(2,  " 4\n" );
00080                         v1 = _getHeartbeat( device );
00081             
00082                         dbg(2, " second try %d ticks/sec\n",
00083                                     (v1-v2)*10 );
00084 
00085                         return device->heartbeat_detected = v1 - v2;
00086                 }
00087         }else{
00088                 unsigned m1, m2, m3, m4;
00089             
00090                 m1 = MBOX_READ(device, 0);
00091                 m2 = MBOX_READ(device, 1);
00092                 m3 = MBOX_READ(device, 2);
00093                 m4 = MBOX_READ(device, 3);
00094                 dbg(1, "acq32_heartbeat ERROR:mailboxes are\n"
00095                             "0x%08x\n0x%08x\n0x%08x\n0x%08x\n",
00096                             m1, m2, m3, m4 );
00097                 return device->heartbeat_detected = 0;
00098         }
00099 }
00100 
00101 
00102 int acq200_getAvailableChannels(struct Acq200Device* device)
00103 {
00104         int rc = acq200_sendQuery(
00105                 device,
00106                 BP_SET_FUNCODE(BPFC_GET_NCHANNELS),
00107                 &device->input_channels.nchannels, 
00108                 &device->output_channels.nchannels,
00109                 NULL_A3,
00110                 NULL_A4
00111                 );
00112 
00113         if (rc != 0){
00114                 err("failed %d", rc);
00115         }
00116         return rc;
00117 }
